visage 0.0.0.9007
  • Reference

Initialization method

Source: R/zzz_VI_MODEL.R
HETER_MODEL-cash-..init...Rd

This function will be called after an instance is built. User input will be stored in the environment. The response variable of this model is y. The formula of y is defined in HETER_MODEL$formula, the null formula is defined in HETER_MODEL$null_formula, the alternative is defined in HETER_MODEL$alt_formula.

Arguments

a

Numeric. Default is a = 0.

b

Numeric. Default is b = 1.

x

Random variable or closed form expression. Default is x = rand_uniform(-1, 1, env = new.env(parent = parent.env(self))).

Value

No return value, called for side effects.

Examples


# Instantiation
test <- heter_model(a = 0, b = 20)

test
#> 
#> ── <HETER_MODEL object>
#> y = 1 + x + e
#>  - x: <RAND_UNIFORM object>
#>    [a: -1, b: 1]
#>  - e: <CLOSED_FORM object>
#>    EXPR = RAND_NORMAL[["gen"]](length(sigma), mu = 0, sigma = sigma)
#>     - sigma: <CLOSED_FORM object>
#>       EXPR = sqrt(1 + (2 - abs(a)) * (x - a)^2 * b)
#>        - x: <RAND_UNIFORM object>
#>          [a: -1, b: 1]
#>  - a: 0
#>  - b: 20 

# Generate data
test$gen(10)
#>             y          x    sigma          e
#> 1   5.8685109  0.5069919 3.358814  4.3615190
#> 2   2.3458618  0.5576647 3.666006  0.7881970
